sentences.en: The Frenchman held his own against the challenger.
sentences.cn: 那个法国人顶住了挑战者的攻击。

sentences.en: The world champion conquered yet another challenger last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚这位世界冠军又战胜了一名挑战者。

sentences.en: The strongest challenger, Texas Democrat Martin Frost, has withdrawn from the race.
sentences.cn: 最强劲的挑战者，德克萨斯州的民主党人马丁·弗罗斯特已经退出了竞选。
